texts: The Coffee Collective - Copenhagen, Denmark - Pioneered the "natural process" coffee method and won multiple barista championships, serving nitrogen-infused cold brew from sleek copper tanks.
Fika Coffee - Kyoto, Japan - Located in a 120-year-old traditional machiya townhouse, they serve pour-over coffee alongside matcha in an intimate setting.
Blue Bottle Coffee - Los Angeles, USA - Inside a historic warehouse indtown, this specialty roaster serves single-origin pour-overs while you watch beans being roasted on a custom Probat roaster.
text: The Coffee Collective - Copenhagen, Denmark - Pioneered the "natural process" coffee method and won multiple barista championships, serving nitrogen-infused cold brew from sleek copper tanks.
title_prefix: Coffee Shop You Need to Visit
